*Patric Curwen (1884–1949), British stage and film actor
The Ringer is a 1931 British crime film directed by Walter Forde and starring Patric Curwen, Esmond Knight, John Longden and Carol Goodner.

The Grand Escapade is a 1946 British family adventure film directed by John Baxter and starring The Artemus Boys,Kinematograph Year Book 1947 p.16,Monthly Film Bulletin October 1946 p.134 James Harcourt, Patric Curwen and Peter Bull.BFI.org
Nothing Venture is a 1948 British comedy family film directed by John Baxter and starring The Artemus Boys, Terry Randall, Patric Curwen and Michael Aldridge.Murphy p.41
